attributes.action: To get The Speaker of the house make the PM answer questions during PMQs
attributes.additional_details: The Pm never answers important question during this time of Brexit and Covid
attributes.background: To make the Speaker of the House responsible for the PM to be Scrutinised at PMQs, and make sure he answers Questions from the opposition

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament as a whole aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Order in the Commons is the responsibility of the Speaker personally, and the Prime Minister is responsible for answers to questions.
